name: Texas A&M Japanese Language and Culture Club
description:
(a)to foster a greater understanding of the Japanese culture among students, faculty and staff of Texas A&M University (TAMU), as well as the community, through various activities
(b)to serve as a resource on Japan for the campus and community
(c)to provide opportunities for networking and socialization among members
(d)to facilitate the adjustment and settling-in of Japanese newin the community, and serve as a general resource for existing members
(e)to provide a point of contact for families and/or relatives in Japan in the event of an emergency
